Compact view for Poll no Beta :
Small thumbnails for less scrolling and faster explore a pool in Beta mode...

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

additional_info: ▶ Important Notes: Waterfox Classic: Thumbnail load normally, just a problem with a page jumping. I can't solve it but it's usable (i prefer a smaller thumbnail and i use it always). NEW (2021.01) Seems against this jumping to top problem, i found a solution with an userscript! Read: Page keeps jumping to top when trying to scroll down thru Pool NO Beta - Solution by script the script to test: Don't fuck with my scroll!!! Firefox Quantum and Chrome: Seems there is a problem about thumbnail: They don't load totally (some stay Blank, don't know why...) It's why i removed the Small view from my : Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1) My Userstyles for Flickr on USO Archives (Faster and more usable than Userstyles.org): UserStyles.org Archive
